Reviews.Title: Amazing camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Steve E
Reviews.Content: The sensor is excellent. Takes great pictures. The viewfinder is barely adequate but it is nice to have when you can't  see the lcd screen. It has a standard hot shoe for flash, not the older minolta style.
